description: This file defines the KnowledgeTools class, which provides tools for reasoning, searching, and analyzing knowledge base documents within an AI agent framework. It includes methods for internal reasoning (think), querying the knowledge base (search), and evaluating search results (analyze). The class is designed to be used as part of a larger AI toolkit for managing knowledge-related tasks.

classes.name: KnowledgeTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing reasoning, search, and analysis tools for managing and querying knowledge base documents within an AI agent or team context.

methods.name: think
methods.description: Records a reasoning thought internally, appending it to the agent or team's session state, and returns a formatted log of all thoughts.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search on the knowledge base using the provided query, returning the relevant documents as a JSON string or an error message.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Evaluates the search results or reasoning process, appending analysis notes to the session state, and returns a formatted analysis log.
